allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Full-stack authentication platform with guild system

Features:
- React 18 + Vite frontend with dark mode support
- Node.js/Express backend with MongoDB Atlas
- Discord & Google OAuth authentication
- JWT-based session management
- Guild management system with leader, sub-leaders \(max 4\), and members
- Role-based access control \(user, guild_leader, admin\)
- Responsive UI with hierarchical guild member display

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
